ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] HERITRIX

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Can you provide some details?  A screenshot of what the page looks  
like?  Here is what the Plone project recommends as an approach for  
asking for help:

http://plone.org/documentation/how-to/ask-for-help

Heritrix is powerful, but I agree that it isn't the most simple tool,  
mostly cause what it is doing it tough!

Cheers,
Eric

On May 16, 2009, at 3:34 AM, developmentalnerd wrote:

>
>
> hello. could somebody help in using this tool. it wont work on my  
> computer with windows xp os......
>
> I tried so hard but still it wont work. I have followed some step in  
> the web, running it through cmd but still it wont work. displays the  
> error that password should be restricted blah blah
>
> im using version 1.14
>
> thanks
>
>
>
